name: Volotic
tagline: Volotic is an experimental non-linear sequencer for the iPad.
body:
### Welcome

Volotic is an experimental non-linear sequencer for the iPad inspired in part by tower defense games. View the full [project write-up](http://www.scottmadethis.net/interactive/volotic/) in [my portfolio](http://www.scottmadethis.net/).

### Instructional Wiki

For basic help using Volotic, check out the [wiki](http://github.com/scottgarner/Volotic/wiki).

### Issues

If you've discovered a bug or have a suggestion for a new feature, please post to the [issue tracker](http://github.com/scottgarner/Volotic/issues).

### Author

Volotic is a sound art project in app form by me (@scottgarner).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
